TopicTitle: Is there a way to have a custom glow texture for the breaking ground suit.

Articles.Content:
I am am making class-specific suits with the class icons on them, is there a way to change the glow texture.

I have done everything to make a normal suit including the config and regular texture, but in is there a way to specify a csutom glow texture in the config.

I have also extracted the default glow texture from the files.
